description:
Lin and Bat go undercover, but henchmen of the area commander, Bask, capture an innocent boy and girl after mistaking them for Lin and Bat. The callous Bask seeks to execute the girl as an example. Lin and Bat, ready to give up their lives, reveal themselves out in the open. Then, a man suddenly appears... Kenshiro, riding Raoh`s beloved steed Kokuoh!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Savior Comes from the North!!
救世主, 北より来たる!
